about.title: About me
about.text:
I'm a Fullstack Engineer. Implemented enterprise web applications and CMS based solutions using frameworks like Laravel and Vue.

Dedicated to perfecting my craft by learning from more seasoned developers, remaining humble, and continuously making strides to learn all that I can about development. I'm actively looking for remote opportunities, if interested, contact me.

education.title: 13 37 POOL
education.subtitle: General Programation bootcamp
education.description: Driven by curiosity, I challenged myself to leave everything behind and dive into a digital pool. Like a game, the goal was to gather XP from days, projects and exams to level-up as much as possible. And it worked :)

education.title: HIGH-TECH
education.subtitle: Software Engineering
education.description: Gained and integrate knowledge from various subject areas including computer programming, data structures, algorithms, numerical methods, statistics, design patterns, human-computer interaction, computer graphics, information visualization, database systems, web development, software project management, and software engineering.

experience.title: ATOS
experience.subtitle: Senior Full Stack Developer - Scrum Master - VUE/LARAVEL/INTERSYSTEMCACHE
experience.description:
• Enhanced the functionality of the existing back office web applications by implementing additional captivating features to enhance client satisfaction.
  • Leveraging robust API frameworks, I successfully integrated and worked with various APIs, effectively retrieving and manipulating data to meet project requirements.
  • Conducted regular monitoring of business needs and ongoing sprint developments to identify areas for improvement and optimize performance.
  • Implemented streamlined Git processes across teams, ensuring efficient branching workflows and maintaining well-organized Git repositories.
  • Provided comprehensive training and supervision to team members for ongoing reformatting and quality control initiatives.

experience.title: Deloitte Extended Services
experience.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer
experience.description:
• As a consultant, I worked across a wide variety of applications, and projects within Deloitte.
  • Performed key role in cross-functional management and clients through planning phases of projects. development, testing, and product launch.
  • Frontend and backend development of web applications.

recommandations.profile: Digital Marketing DreamerðŸ¦‹ User first analystðŸ“Š
recommandations.desc_recommendation: Good listener, persevering and reliable, Yassine doesn't stop at providing a good technical solution. He also makes sure that the solution meets the need, and proactively suggests improvements to go even further. He is able to challenge solutions and give constructive feedback. He doesn't fear pressure, and is quick to react to more urgent requests. You can feel his ability to manage projects and/or teams. I can highly recommend him: you'll have no trouble entrusting your projects to him, they'll be in good hands. As far as I'm concerned, this collaboration was flawless!

recommandations.profile: Manager Offensive Security - Deloitte France - Cyber
recommandations.desc_recommendation: Yassine m'a accompagnÃ© en tant que lead dÃ©veloppeur sur une application PHP Laravel / Vue.JS. Il a fait preuve d'implication, de flexibilitÃ© et de professionnalisme pour livrer une version 1 stable et fonctionnelle ayant rempli pleinement ses objectifs. Merci Yassine ! Je recommande ses services.

recommandations.profile: Digital manager, fullstack developer, web designer, and geek
recommandations.desc_recommendation: I'm pleased and feel privileged to have worked with Yassine, we built so many projects together and it always was a pleasant experience for us both. On top of being a skilled developer what i appreciate in Yassine is the fact that he has the communication skills to manage his projects directly and independently with our clients, he also has the right mindset during stressful and demanding situations. he's also flexible and a fast learner to any programming language your project may need, he literally was a self contained digital agency all by himself.

recommandations.profile: Finance Transformation Manager and Tech Excellence Lead at Majorel
recommandations.desc_recommendation: I had the great pleasure of working with Yassine at Deloitte. He knows his way around people, he is good with the clients, does whatever it takes to help colleagues and gets things done. The collaboration was very smooth and his assistance definitely made a huge impact on the success of a couple projects we worked on. I highly recommend this profile which has always been able to demonstrate relevance and competence.
